content.rendered: Part-time Accounting Associates   South Tulsa medical center and residential community seeking candidates for part-time Accountant. Candidate will be expected to process and finalize deposits, generate revenue cycle and cash management, reconciliations and general data entry. Detail oriented and fast processing candidates preferred Heavy cash-handling and management experience required Must have some administrative accounting experience, preferably with health care experience. Compensation negotiations begin at $15/hr, but will be based on background and experience. EOE
